entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
